BriefDescription: This event counts operations that cause a cache access to the L3 cache, as defined by the sum of L2D_CACHE_REFILL_L3D_CACHE and L2D_CACHE_WB_VICTIM_CLEAN events.
This event counts access counted by L3D_CACHE that is a Memory-read operation, as defined by the L2D_CACHE_REFILL_L3D_CACHE events.
This event counts operations that cause a cache access to the L3 cache.
This event counts L2D_CACHE_REFILL_L3D_CACHE caused by demand access.
This event counts L2D_CACHE_REFILL_L3D_CACHE caused by demand read access.
This event counts L2D_CACHE_REFILL_L3D_CACHE caused by demand write access.
This event counts L2D_CACHE_REFILL_L3D_CACHE caused by hardware prefetch or software prefetch.
This event counts L2D_CACHE_REFILL_L3D_CACHE caused by hardware prefetch.
This event counts operations that cause a miss of the L3 cache. Note: This event may count inaccurately.
This event counts L2D_CACHE_REFILL_L3D_MISS caused by demand access.
This event counts L2D_CACHE_REFILL_L3D_MISS caused by demand read access.
This event counts L2D_CACHE_REFILL_L3D_MISS caused by demand write access.
This event counts L2D_CACHE_REFILL_L3D_MISS caused by hardware prefetch or software prefetch. Note: This event may count inaccurately.
This event counts L2D_CACHE_REFILL_L3D_MISS caused by hardware prefetch. Note: This event may count inaccurately.
This event counts operations that cause a hit of the L3 cache. Note: This event may count inaccurately.
This event counts L2D_CACHE_REFILL_L3D_HIT caused by demand access.
This event counts L2D_CACHE_REFILL_L3D_HIT caused by demand read access.
This event counts L2D_CACHE_REFILL_L3D_HIT caused by demand write access.
This event counts L2D_CACHE_REFILL_L3D_HIT caused by hardware prefetch or software prefetch. Note: This event may count inaccurately.
This event counts L2D_CACHE_REFILL_L3D_HIT caused by hardware prefetch. Note: This event may count inaccurately.
This event counts the number of L3 cache misses caused by demand access where the requests hit the PFTGT buffer.
This event counts L2D_CACHE_REFILL_L3D_MISS_DM_PFTGT_HIT caused by read access.
This event counts L2D_CACHE_REFILL_L3D_MISS_DM_PFTGT_HIT caused by write access.
This event counts L2D_CACHE_REFILL_L3D_MISS_DM where the requests access the memory in the same socket as the requests.
This event counts L2D_CACHE_REFILL_L3D_MISS_DM where the requests access the memory in the different socket from the requests.
This event counts L2D_CACHE_REFILL_L3D_MISS_DM where the requests access the different L2 cache from the requests in the same Numa nodes as the requests.
This event counts L2D_CACHE_REFILL_L3D_MISS_DM where the requests access L2 cache in the different Numa nodes from the requests in the same socket as the requests.
This event counts L2D_CACHE_REFILL_L3D_MISS_DM where the requests access L3 cache in the different Numa nodes from the requests in the same socket as the requests.
This event counts L2D_CACHE_REFILL_L3D_MISS_DM where the requests access L2 cache in the different socket from the requests.
This event counts L2D_CACHE_REFILL_L3D_MISS_DM where the requests access L3 cache in the different socket from the requests.

This event counts access counted by L3D_CACHE that is not completed by the L3 cache, and a Memory-read operation, as defined by the L2D_CACHE_REFILL_L3D_MISS events. Note: This event may count inaccurately.
